verses.name: Numbers 28:14
verses.text: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

verses.name: Numbers 28:15
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the Lord shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:16
verses.text: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the Lord.
